content.prompt: The sum of the squares of the first ten natural numbers is,1^2 + 2^2 + ... + 10^2 = 385The square of the sum of the first ten natural numbers is,(1 + 2 + ... + 10)^2 = 552 = 3025Hence the difference between the sum of the squares of the first ten natural numbers and the square of the sum is 3025 − 385 = 2640.Write a method that finds the difference between the sum of the squares of the first n natural numbers and the square of the sum.

uses.context_name: Java: INFSCI 0017 | Norway-Spring2018 Java Course > For Loops
